name: justify
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to give or to be a good reason for
trans_examp.trans_cn: 为…辩护；证明…正当（或有理、正确）；是…的正当理由

example.eg: I can't really justify taking another day off work.
example.egtrans: 我真的找不出理由再多休一天假了。

example.eg: Are you sure that these measures are justified?
example.egtrans: 你确定这些措施合理吗？

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: If you justify yourself, you give a good reason for what you have done.

example.eg: It was the only thing that I could do - I don't have to justify myself to anyone.
example.egtrans: 这是我唯一能做的——我不必向任何人解释。
